title: Create visible Admin UI for product management and restrict access to grandzbee@gmail.com (via Internet Identity principal allowlist)

requirements.text: Make the admin area discoverable in the UI by adding a clearly visible navigation entry that routes to /admin, even when the current user is not an admin (the page must still be protected by the admin guard).

quotes: Yes create the admin UI. The credentails should be Google account of grandzbee@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation includes an "Admin" entry that navigates to /admin.
If a non-admin user clicks "Admin", they are routed to /admin and shown an access denied screen (no admin content is rendered).
If an admin user clicks "Admin", they are routed to /admin and the admin product management UI is rendered.

requirements.text: Enforce admin access based on an allowlist of Internet Identity principals, and provide a backend mechanism for a canister controller to add the admin principal corresponding to the Internet Identity that is linked to Google account grandzbee@gmail.com.

quotes: The credentails should be Google account of grandzbee@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes an admin-check function used by the frontend (e.g., the existing actor.isCallerAdmin() call used by useIsAdmin returns true only for allowlisted principals).
Backend provides a controller-only method to add an admin principal to the allowlist.
Once the principal for the Internet Identity linked to grandzbee@gmail.com is added to the allowlist, that identity is recognized as admin (admin check returns true) and can perform product CRUD.
Non-allowlisted principals cannot call admin-only product APIs (create/update/delete/listAll/uploadProductImage) and receive an authorization error.

requirements.text: Update user-facing admin-access messaging to reflect the actual authentication model: users must sign in with Internet Identity, and only the Internet Identity that is linked to Google account grandzbee@gmail.com is permitted as admin.

quotes: The credentails should be Google account of grandzbee@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: The /admin access denied UI includes English text indicating that admin access is restricted to the Internet Identity linked to Google account grandzbee@gmail.com.
No UI claims that direct Google OAuth login is supported; wording references Internet Identity and linking to the specified Google account.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components only).
Do not modify frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Only Internet Identity authentication is supported; do not add Google OAuth or third-party authentication flows.
nonGoals: Implementing Google OAuth sign-in, reading email addresses from an identity provider, or any third-party auth integration.
Adding additional admin modules beyond product management CRUD (e.g., order management, user management) unless explicitly requested.
Real-time updates or websocket-based admin features.
